item.title: The Notion Paradox: When People Love "Bloated" Products
item.description: Notion is a spectacular success story, a textbook rocket ship. Between 2019 and 2020 alone, its number of users grew from one million to over four million. When the pandemic filled the startup world with a freezing terror, Notion raised $50 million in 36 hours. A deluge of fabulous reviews keeps pouring. Passioned tweets, exalted Youtube videos, grassroots meetups. That’s the stuff of dreams, for countless entrepreneurs, product managers, and designers from San Francisco to Beijing.
